I have a problem to use cookie and retry a URL. 

1. If I use http://www.my=
jones.com/code/signup.php as the seed and set
the crawler to only the seed.=
 This URL will get an HTTP response
status 302 and be redirected to
http://=
www.myjones.com/code/signup.php?cook=3Dt, because there is no
cookie setted=
.

2. Same thing happens for http://www.myjones.com/code/. It will get
302 =
and be redirected to http://www.myjones.com/code/?cook=3Dt

3. If I use bot=
h http://www.myjones.com/code/ and
http://www.myjones.com/code/signup.php a=
s the seeds and set the
crawler to save and load cookie from file,
http://w=
ww.myjones.com/code/ still get 302 and be redirected to
http://www.myjones.=
com/code/?cook=3Dt, but
http://www.myjones.com/code/signup.php will be craw=
led successfully
(200 OK). 

Can anybody tell me how to retry http://www.my=
jones.com/code/ ?

Said in another way. Now the situation is

URL #1 and #2=
 are in the seeds list.

URL #1 (with no cookie) got 302 and be redirected =
to URL #3 (set cookie)

URL #2 (load cookie) got 200 OK

Can I retry URL #1=
 with the cookie, so it can be correctly crawled?

thanks
